name: nodeapibigexercise
description:
Create a Reminders API. It should be able to do the following things: - create a new reminder which has the fields **title** (string up to 500 characters) and **done** (boolean) - mark a reminder as "done" - delete a reminder - mark a reminder which is "done" as not "done"

The steps you need to do:

  • create a mongo database
  • write API documentation for your RESTful API
  • get it approved by senior Dev
  • implement the API
